Package controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CustomerBookingGridViewController
    Purpose: Controller for View on which the user can select a seat for a previously chosen film screening.
    CustomerBookingHistoryViewController
    Purpose: This controller connects view to database.
    CustomerBookingProcessViewController
    Purpose: This controller manages the following sequence.
    CustomerEditInformationViewController
    Purpose: Controller loads customer data from database.
    CustomerRootController
    Purpose: Root view of the user after login.
    LoginController
    Purpose: LoginController class handles business logic for the login process as it initiates either customer or manager root views, depending on the option chosen (customer login or employee log in).
    ManagerAddMovieViewController
    Purpose: This class enables to add a movie including all important information in the SQLite database.
    ManagerAddScreeningViewController
    Purpose: This class enables to add screenings including all important information in the SQLite database, corresponding to available films only
    ManagerMoviesViewController
    Purpose: This controller is connected to the ManagerMoviesView, where the staff member can add a new film in the screening schedule and is also able to view an up-to date list of all movies shown at least once.
    ManagerRootController
    Purpose: Landing page for the Employee after successful login.
    ManagerScreeningsViewController
    Purpose: This class provides a detail for for a single screening the employee selects on the previous page (employee root view).The employee (manager) can view explicit booked and available seats, graphical summary of it and can download all screening data as csv text file.
    ManagerStatisticsViewController
    Purpose: This controller controls the view on which the manager can analyze past screenings and see, how well they sold.
    MovieListViewRowControllerCustomer
    Purpose: Controls the elements in the specified row layout for the list view and populates the individual elements (Image, text etc.) with data from database Tutorials & resources: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/19588029/customize-listview-in-javafx-with-fxml, https://stackoverflow.com/questions/10699655/combo-box-key-value-pair-in-javafx-2/10700642#10700642, https://stackoverflow.com/questions/41319752/listview-setcellfactory-with-generic-label
    MovieListViewRowControllerManager
    Purpose: Controls the elements in the specified row layout for the list view and populates the individual elements (Image, text etc.) with data from database Tutorials & resources: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/19588029/customize-listview-in-javafx-with-fxml, https://stackoverflow.com/questions/10699655/combo-box-key-value-pair-in-javafx-2/10700642#10700642, https://stackoverflow.com/questions/41319752/listview-setcellfactory-with-generic-label
    ScreeningListViewRowController
    Purpose: Controls the elements in the specified row layout for the list view and populates the individual elements (Image, text etc.) with data from database Sources: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/19588029/customize-listview-in-javafx-with-fxml, https://stackoverflow.com/questions/10699655/combo-box-key-value-pair-in-javafx-2/10700642#10700642, https://stackoverflow.com/questions/41319752/listview-setcellfactory-with-generic-label
